id_table_3.caption: TABLE III: Ablation study on MuPoTS-3D dataset. TD, BU, MP, CH, IN, PM, SSL, TTO stand for top-down, bottom-up, multi-person pose estimator, combined heatmap, integration network, pose matching, semi-supervised learning, and test time optimization, respectively. Best in bold, second best underlined.

id_table_6.caption: TABLE VI: Ablation study of test time optimization on Human3.6M dataset. MPJPE (w. GT) means 2D ground truth is used, MPJPE (w/o GT) means 2D pose estimation is used instead of the ground truth. Best in bold, second best underlined.
table:
Method MPJPE (w. GT) MPJPE (w/o GT)
Baseline 44.84 58.71
+ reprojection regularization 39.27 54.45
+ trajectory regularization 38.92 53.91
+ bone length consistency 37.11 51.30
+ one-stage optimization 35.75 50.66
+ two-stage optimization 34.95 49.31
